name: AMC Strategy
goal: To inform, educate and raise awareness of the importance of the EU as a global, economic and political policymaker. AMC Strategy provides knowledge and expertise to companies, NGO's, not‐for‐profit organisations and EU policymakers.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Youth
